Kamala Harris used her social media acco: to help post bail" for individuals arrested in the state while protesting the death of George Floyd.
Republican Sen: Lindsey Graham claimed that Harris "actually bailed out rioters," one of whom went back to the streets and broke somebody's head open.
The Minnesota Freedom Fund: promoted by Harris and other public figures, raised nearly $40 million in donations in 2020 and has spent over half a million on bail for people arrested while protesting against racism and police brutality.
